Can someone tell me if this is the correct place to ask questions about activelit.com? I have a variety of questions about how it works separate from Quest, so I'm not sure if this forum is the right place to post. I don't see a forum for Activelit users, so I'm not sure where to go for help.
Thank you!

(Can't unpublish games, can't change the name of a game, descriptions not showing for games)

Posts.EditableText: This is probably the best place, but I am not sure who will be able to help, as the regulars do not use it. If you get no response, try PMing manowar, as he runs ActiveLit (I think he replied to your earlier thread).

Thanks again!
